page.title: 14650TH CHURCH ANNIVERSARY
page.content: In July 1985 St.Margaret's Church held their 650th Anniversary.There was hisorical exhibition which included {lacemaking{ and {bookbinding}.A Pageant of local history was held in the streets at night.There was a concert performed by the Medway Towns Band as well as a play,{"Murder in the Cathedral".}Other events included a {Fair},and {Religious Services.} A Church has been on the site since about {811 A.D.}The present building was begun in {1335}.The roof is made from massive {tree trunks},roughly shaped and the tower was begun in 1470. Two well known local famillies,the {Bloors} and {Tuftons} have memorials here.The {Parish Chest} dates from 1335.There may be tunnels to {Bloors Place} which were used by {smugglers} arriving in the {Creek} at night.
